suppress.notes:
file name: logback-core-1.5.11.jar
This vulnerability is fixed in 1.5.13.
Spring boot versions 3.4.2+ imports 1.5.16. This is expected to be released in late Jan 2025.
The attack involves the modification of DOCTYPE declaration in XML configuration files. The attack requires existing privilege so the risk is low.

file name: logback-core-1.5.11.jar
This vulnerability is fixed in 1.5.13.
Spring boot versions 3.4.2+ imports 1.5.16. This is expected to be released in late Jan 2025.
A successful attack requires the user to have write access to a configuration file. Alternatively, the attacker could inject a malicious environment variable pointing to a malicious configuration file. In both cases, the attack requires existing privilege so the risk is low.
